record.field:
Discover Scuba Diving – Take the Plunge!

Ever been fascinated by the underwater world but never had the courage to dive in? Not sure if scuba is for you? Our PADI Open Water Diver experience is the perfect way to test the waters!

Schedule & Duration

📅 Monday to Friday

📍 Meet at the dive school every day at 10:00 AM

🤿 Includes 4 dive trips (each lasting 1.5 hours)

🏊 Plus pool practice sessions to build confidence before heading into open water

What to Expect

In a relaxed setting, we’ll guide you through:

✅ A short but thorough briefing on water pressure, underwater communication, and equipment use.

✅ Breathing with a regulator and moving underwater with full gear.

✅ Pool practice sessions to master the basics in a controlled environment.

✅ A taste of key Open Water Diver techniques.

✅ A final debrief to wrap up your experience.

Price: €550 per person (excl. VAT)

Included:

✔ Pool entry

✔ Full gear rental (fins, mask, tank, BCD, regulator, weights)

✔ Full wetsuit

✔ 4 dive trips (1.5 hours each)

✔ Pool practice sessions

✔ Insurance & admin fees

What to Bring

🩱 Swimsuit

🛁 Towel

😁 A smile & a sense of adventure!

Who Can Join?

👉 Minimum age: 12 years (parental consent required for minors).

📄 Important: Before joining, you must complete and sign the PADI Diver Medical Form:

Download the form here.

📩 Send the completed form to info@divetours-industry.odoo.com at least 3 days before the start of your booked course.

Ready to Dive In?

Just click on register now!

Discover Scuba Diving – Take the Plunge!

Ever been fascinated by the underwater world but never had the courage to dive in? Not sure if scuba is for you? Our PADI Open Water Diver experience is the perfect way to test the waters!

Schedule & Duration

📅 Monday to Friday

📍 Meet at the dive school every day at 10:00 AM

🤿 Includes 4 dive trips (each lasting 1.5 hours)

🏊 Plus pool practice sessions to build confidence before heading into open water

What to Expect

In a relaxed setting, we’ll guide you through:

✅ A short but thorough briefing on water pressure, underwater communication, and equipment use.

✅ Breathing with a regulator and moving underwater with full gear.

✅ Pool practice sessions to master the basics in a controlled environment.

✅ A taste of key Open Water Diver techniques.

✅ A final debrief to wrap up your experience.

Price: €550 per person (excl. VAT)

Included:

✔ Pool entry

✔ Full gear rental (fins, mask, tank, BCD, regulator, weights)

✔ Full wetsuit

✔ 4 dive trips (1.5 hours each)

✔ Pool practice sessions

✔ Insurance & admin fees

What to Bring

🩱 Swimsuit

🛁 Towel

😁 A smile & a sense of adventure!

Who Can Join?

👉 Minimum age: 12 years (parental consent required for minors).


📄 Important: Before joining, you must complete and sign the PADI Diver Medical Form:

Download the form here.

📩 Send the completed form to info@divetours-industry.odoo.com at least 3 days before the start of your booked course.
